喷字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 喷腾〖 spurt;spout;gush〗 喷嚏〖 sternutation;sneeze〗 喷头〖 showernozzle〗.

list.abs: sternutation 打喷嚏sternutative 催嚏剂sternutatory 催打喷嚏的
2. B staphylococcus enterotoxin B喷嚏性毒剂 sternutatorQ
...大量流泪,怕光和睑痉挛,高浓度对上呼吸道和皮肤也有刺激作用,主要代表有CN和CR, 喷嚏剂,sternutator,以上呼吸道强烈刺激作用为主,引起剧烈和难以控制的喷嚏,咳嗽,流涕和流涎,并有恶心,呕吐和全身不适.
intractable nonlinearity 难处理的非线性  intractable refractory 顽固性的  intractable sneezing 顽固性喷嚏  intractable sternutation 顽固性喷嚏  intractable ulcer.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin sternutatio(n-), from the verb sternutare, frequentative of sternuere 'to sneeze'

means.word_mean: 1. a symptom consisting of the involuntary expulsion of air from the nose
